content.rendered: Cryptocurrency is becoming more common as a form of payment for products and services. As a small business owner, do you understand the tax implications? How does the IRS view crypto? Lead Tax Attorney Philip Hwang and CEO David King discuss the gray areas of cryptocurrency and tax obligations.
